程序包 ride

类 OngoingRide

  • java.lang.Object
    • ride.Ride
      • ride.OngoingRide
  • public class OngoingRide
extends Ride
    generate a "half riding" with only starting information
    作者:
    Zhihao Li

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      OngoingRide​(User user, Station startStation, Bicycle bicycle)
      generate a "half riding" with only starting information without given start time
      OngoingRide​(User user, Station startStation, Bicycle bicycle, long startTime)
      generate a "half riding" with only starting information with given start time

    • 方法概要

      Calculate the cost of the ride.

      to finish a ride at a station with system time to be noted down

      to get duration of a ride in order to calculate cost

    • 构造器详细资料

      • OngoingRide

        public OngoingRide​(User user,
                   Station startStation,
                   Bicycle bicycle)
        generate a "half riding" with only starting information without given start time
        参数:
        user - riding user
        startStation - start station
        bicycle - riding bicycle

      • OngoingRide

        public OngoingRide​(User user,
                   Station startStation,
                   Bicycle bicycle,
                   long startTime)
        generate a "half riding" with only starting information with given start time
        参数:
        user - riding user
        startStation - start station
        bicycle - riding bicycle
        startTime - given start time

    • 方法详细资料

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        override toString method of OngoingRide
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object

      • endAt

        public void endAt​(Station endStation)
        to finish a ride at a station with system time to be noted down
        参数:
        endStation - the end station to be noted down

      • endAfter

        public void endAfter​(Station endStation,
                     double lengthInMin)
        Let the ride end after a certain amount of time (durationInMin)
        参数:
        endStation - the end station to be noted down
        lengthInMin - The length of time of the ride, in minutes.

      • getTimeNeedsToPay

        public double getTimeNeedsToPay()
        to get duration of a ride in order to calculate cost
        返回:
        duration time to be charged

      • setTimeCreditUsed

        public void setTimeCreditUsed​(int timeCreditUsed)

      • charge

        public double charge()
        Calculate the cost of the ride.
        返回:
        The total cost of the ride, in EUR
